nodes.bodyText: How will the ParseException manifest in an actual WS call?

Does this meant the AdjustmentType has to be specified?
Have that, and a few other questions at: https://github.infra.cloudera.com/sseth/thunderhead/blob/master/services/api/distrox/src/main/java/com/cloudera/thunderhead/service/distroxapi/server/Conversions.java#L347 (Also other comments which mention: "check with Santosh")

Is the API allowing multiple scalingRequests to be specified for a single cluster already? Don't see a check for that. (I'm explicitly disallowing this on the CDP API).
Given that the UI will call this API directly, the check is likely required here as well (to avoid accidental UI code bugs)
Is the ScalingPolicy field optional, or validated elsewhere?
This essentially means we are back to inefficient queries (full table scans), correct?
